page.title: 08 MATTHEW KNIGHT'S SATURDAY
page.content:
I wake up to the sight of my naughty pin up calendar. On a Saturday I tumber out of bed and if I have time I read a Paddington book. As soon as I make a noise my little dog called Tiny will rush upstairs to see me. I don't fancy breakfast on Saturdays, so I plonk myself down in an armchair to watch TV. After a sandwich lunch we go shopping to Wetherby and I buy 3 cans of coke. I think coke makes me run faster - its the fizz in it.
On Saturdays I ride my BMX bike and in the evening my young lady comes to see me while mum and dad go out drinking. Sometimes we get a video or watch TV. When I get a wash at bedtime there's always hairs in the sink from my dad and toothpaste all over. The loo always needs flushing too!
